title: Peter Sagan to Ride with Pierre Baguette Road Team to Tune up for MTB Olympics
content:
Slovak megastar to keep road wheels spinning with brother's Conti-level squad: 'My goal is to have fun and try to qualify for Paris'.

Read the full article at Peter Sagan to Ride with Pierre Baguette Road Team to Tune up for MTB Olympics on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
